pages.title: Conjurer
pages.text: The Conjurer is a mini-boss that resides in Theaters deep in the forest. He uses magic to summon deadly Killer Rabbits. The Conjurer's Hat, once dropped, gives you more health, and it can also prevent unwanted raids in villages...

pages.name: Conjurer
pages.text: The Conjurer's Hat is mostly very stylish, and its rubbon can be dyed.
